name: Draw and Lie
summary:
Draw, lie and ensure that your friends do not discover that you are the liar painter. Play now for free on this Among Us/Scribble crossover free browser game, perfect to have fun with your friends.

At the start of the game, one of the players will be the liar, and the rest will know the secret word. When the time to draw begins, everyone draw something related to the secret word. Be careful! The liar is sneaking all the drawings, and he can sabotage one player per round blocking his vision or controls, or even erasing the drawing. When time is up, after seeing all the drawings, everyone has to vote a player to kick out, and the game ends if the liar has been caught, or if he has stayed alive until the end.
